drawing_procedure: NONE
using only blue for the whole drawing, paint the 2nd through 4th tiles in the 1st and 5th columns
paint the 1st and 4th tiles in columns 2 and 4
paint the 1st and 5th tiles in column 3
NONE
In the leftmost column, color tiles 2-4 from the top the color blue
In the second column from the left, color tiles 1 and 4 from the top blue
In the third column from the left, color tiles 1 and 5 from the top blue
In the fourth column from the left, color tiles 1 and 4 from the top blue
In the fifth column from the left, color tiles 2-4 from the top blue
NONE
Starting in the first column, color the 2nd tile from the to blue.
Color the two tiles under it blue.
Repeat this in the fifth column.  2nd tile from the top and the two underneath it will be blue.
These 2 lines will form a hexagon when connected.  So, in the 2nd, 3rd, and 4th column, color the top most tile blue.
In the 2nd and 4th column, color the fourth tile from the top blue.
In the 3rd column, color the fifth tile from the top blue.  Congratulations!
NONE
Start to make a red flower by coloring the second and third tiles in the first and third columns red.
Color the first and third tiles in the second column red to finish the red flower.
Make another flower exactly like the red one, but color it yellow and place it directly under the red flower, with the edges of the two flowers touching.
Create a third flower under the yellow flower but make this one blue.
Now, copy the stack of flowers three times across the board leaving an empty column between each stack.
NONE

On second row from left, Second row from the top, sixth row from left, second row from top, tenth row from left, second row from top and fourteenth row from left, second row from top, leave that tile blank but color all others that abut it red, making a red circle, 4 times.

On the second row from left, and the fifth tile down from the top of that row, additionally sixth row from left, fifth tile down from top there, Additionally tenth row from left, and fifth tile from top, and lastly fourteenth from leftmost vertical row and the fifth tile downwards in that row, leave that tile blank but color all those tiles that abut it yellow. This will make 4 yellow circles.

on second row from left, third tile from the bottom, additionally, sixth row from left, third tile from bottom, additionally, tenth row from left, third from bottom, and finally, fourteenth from left and third from bottom, leave these tiles white but color in all that touch it, blue. This will create a series of 4 blue circles.
NONE
Paint the tiles 2 and 3 red, 5 and 6 yellow, and 8 and 9 blue in columns 1, 3, 5, 7, 9, 11, 13, and 15
Paint tiles 1 and 3 red, 4 and 6 yellow, and 7 and 9 blue in columns 2, 6, 10, and 14
NONE
With green, color the 6 cells around the cell located at the 2nd column from left and 2nd row from top.
With orange, color the 6 cells around the cell located at the 5th column from left and 2nd row from top.
Repeat the patterns from steps 1 and 2 across to the right until you reach the end of the grid.
Now starting with orange this time, repeat the patterns created in steps 1-3 so that each ring is directly underneath each ring.
Now starting with green on the left, create a 3rd row of rings directly underneath the 2nd row of rings.
NONE
Use orange to encircle the 5th spot in columns 2, 8, and 14, and the 2nd and 8th spots in columns 5, 11, and 17.
Use green to encircle the 5th spot in columns 5, 11, and 17, and the 2nd and 8th spots in columns 2, 8, and 14.
NONE
In columns # 1,3, 7, 9, 13, and 15 paint the second and third from the top green, and paint the second and third from the bottom green. Next paint the fifth and sixth tile down from the top orange.
In columns # 2, 8, and 14 paint the first, third, seventh, and ninth tiles down from the top green. Next paint the fourth and sixth tile down from the top orange.
In columns # 4, 6, 10, 12, 16, and 18, paint the top two tiles orange and paint the seventh and eighth tiles down orange. Next paint the fourth and fifth tile down green.
In columns # 5, 9, and 17 paint the first, third, seventh, and ninth tiles down from the top orange. Next paint the fourth and sixth tile down from the top green.
NONE
In the leftmost column paint the fourth tile from the top blue.
Skip two tiles below and paint the next tile blue.
Skip two tiles below and paint the next tile blue.
In the next column paint the third tile from the top blue.
Skip two tiles below and paint the next tile blue.
Skip two tiles below and paint the next tile blue.
Skip a column and in the next column paint the fourth tile from the top blue.
Skip two tiles below and paint the next tile blue.
Skip two tiles below and paint the next tile blue.
In the next column paint the fourth tile from the top blue.
Skip two tiles below and paint the next tile blue.
Skip two tiles below and paint the next tile blue.
Skip a column and in the next column paint the third and fourth tile from the top blue.
Skip a tile below and paint the next two tiles blue.
Skip a tile below and paint the next two tiles blue.
Notice the pattern created in columns 1-7.
Skip a column and recreate the pattern in the next seven columns.
Skip a column and in the next column paint the fourth tile from the top blue.
Skip two tiles below and paint the next tile blue.
Skip two tiles below and paint the next tile blue.
In the next column paint the third tile from the top blue.
Skip two tiles and paint the next tile blue.
Skip two tiles and paint the next tile blue.

NONE
In columns #1, 4, 5, 9, 12, 13, and 17 paint the fourth, seventh and tenth tiles from the top blue.
In columns #2, 10, and 18 paint the third, sixth and ninth tiles from the top blue.
In columns #7 and 15 start at the third tile and paint 2 tiles down blue, skip one tile, paint the next 2 tiles down blue, skip one tile down and paint the last 2 tiles down blue.
NONE
Starting with the bottom tile of the far left vertical column paint every third tile blue, so that there are three blue tiles, with two blank tiles between each of them.
In the next column to the right, paint one blue tile in the next tile above and to the right of each of the first blue tiles.
Leaving the next column to the right blank, repeat the pattern formed in steps 1 and 2, starting with the bottom tile of the fourth column from the right.
Leaving the next column to the right blank, repeat step 1, beginning at the bottom of column seven, counting from the left.
Paint one blue tile in the next tile above each of the blue tiles in this column.
Leaving the next column to the right blank, continuing to the right, repeat the entire sequence of steps 1 through 5.
Leaving the next column to the right blank, repeat the pattern formed by steps 1 and 2 one more time in the final two columns on the right.
NONE
Make a firework with a red center at the fourth tile down in the fifth column. Make six blue lines shooting off of the center each side of the tile and extending to the edge of the board.
Make another firework with an orange center at the eighth tile of the eighth column. The rest of the firework has green lines shooting off from the orange tile and going to the edge of the board.
Color the tiles black where the two fireworks intersect.
NONE

On the fifth vertical row from the left, fourth tile down, color it red, Color all tiles touching that tile blue continue to make 6 blue rays emanating from one row from each of the 7 blue hex tiles making the original circle.

On the eighth vertical row from left third tile up, color it orange. Color all tiles touching the orange tile here, green, Continue "rays" emanating one each outward from the 6 hex tiles making the ring here, all the way outwards.
Whenever blue and green rays intersect and cross, color that tile black, this will fill in a total of 6 tiles black.
NONE
Use red to fill the 4th spot in the 5th column.
Use orange to fill the 8th spot in the 8th column.
Make a blue circle around the red spot.
Make a green circle around the orange spot.
Make diagonal lines coming off each "petal of the flowers in their corresponding colors.
Change the spot to black where the diagonal lines intersect.
NONE
Create an orange diagonal line from the 3rd spot on the last column to the last spot on the 4th column.
Under that line make every other spot along it green starting at the 4th spot in the last column.
Creat diagonal lines down from each green spot.
NONE
For the fourth tile on the bottom-most row use orange, and paint all upper right tiles, till you reach the end of that diagonal.
Now, change the color to green and paint the tile under the orange one on the rightmost column.
Continue with painting every other tile in the same diagonal row that touches the orange line.
And finish it off by coloring all the downright remaining tiles next to each of those green ones.
NONE
With orange, paint the bottom cell of column 4 from the left.
With orange paint the right most cell of the 3rd row from the top.
With orange, paint a straight line between the 2 orange cells from step 1 and 2.
With green, paint the cell directly underneath the 1st orange cell on the right.
With green, repeat step 4, skipping ever other orange cell.
To the right of the orange line, for each of the green cells you painted, paint a straight descending diagonal line to the end of the grid using green paint.
NONE
Locate the seventh column from the leftmost side.
In that column paint every tile blue to create one vertical line.
Create a diagonal line from the top of the seventh column towards the bottom of the right most column in blue.
The end of the diagonal line should be on the sixth tile from the top of the right most column.
In the eighth column paint the third tile from the top red.
Paint every other tile below red until the bottom is reached.
In the ninth column paint the third tile from the top red.
Paint every other tile below red until the bottom is reached.
In the tenth column paint the fourth tile from the top red.
Skip a tile and paint the next tile below red.
Skip a tile and paint the next tile below red.
In the eleventh column paint the fourth tile from the top red.
Skip a tile and paint the next tile below red.
Skip a tile and paint the next tile below red.
In the twelfth column paint the fifth tile from the top red.
Skip a tile and paint the next tile below red.
In the thirteenth column paint the fifth tile from the top red.
Skip a tile and paint the next tile below red.
In the fourteenth column paint the sixth tile from the top red.
In the fifteenth column paint the sixth tile from the top red.
NONE
Fill in the 7th column from the left BLUE.
In the rightmost column, color in the 5th tile from the bottom BLUE. Extend a BLUE diagonal from this point to the upper left, to meet with the top of the blue column.
In the 8th column from the left, starting from the second tile from the bottom and working up, color every other tile RED. Do not recolor any blue tiles.
Extend solid RED diagonals up and to the right from the tiles you filled in the previous step, until they reach the blue diagonal from step 2.
NONE
On 7th vertical row, fill in all tiles top to bottom with blue.
color the 6th tile from top on the rightmost row of tiles, blue.
color all tiles between the 6th row from the top on right most row and the top tile on 7th vertical tile blue, making a diagonal line of tiles.
Leave the second tile from the top on the 8th row blank. Fill in the two blank tiles that abut that one red. This will form a two tile diagonal row.
Continue alternating white and red rows diagonally making a total of 4 rows of red. fanning out from top to bottom.
NONE
Fill the top 7 hexes in the first column blue.
Fill the top 6 hexes in the third column from the left blue.
Fill another parallel line in the 5th column with purple.
Continue a pattern of parallel lines with one hex between, each line getting shorter by one hex, with lines in blue, purple, blue, purple.

Create a diagonal line starting with the first hex below the first blue line on the left, going in a top-right direction past the last line to the edge of the grid. The fill pattern for the line is 1 each of red, green, red, then three green, 2 each of red, green, red, then 1 each of green, red, green.

NONE
fill in the top 7 spots on the first column with blue and the 8th with red.
fill in the top 6 spots in the 3rd column blue, and the 7th red.
Fill in the top 5 spots in the 5th column with purple, and the 6th green.
fill in the top 4 spots in the 7th column with blue, and the 5th with red.
5. Fill in the top 3 spots in the 9th column with purple, and the 4th green.
6. fill in the top 2 spots of the 11th column with blue, and the 3rd red.
7. Fill in the top spot of the 13th column purple, and the next green.
8. Make the top spot of the 14th column red, and the 15th column green.
9. Make the 2nd spots in the 12th column red
10. Make the 3rd spot in the 10th column green.
11. Make the 4th spot in the 8th column red.
12. Make the 5th spot in the 6th column green.
Make the 6th spot in the 4th column, and the 7th spot in the 2nd column green.
NONE
In column #1 starting at the topmost tile, paint 7 tiles down blue, and then the next tile below those red.
In column #2 paint the seventh tile down green.
In column #3 starting at the topmost tile, paint 6 tiles down blue, and then the next tile below those red.
In column #4 paint the sixth tile down green.
In column #5 starting at the topmost tile, paint 5 tiles down purple, and then the next tile below those green.
In column #6 paint the fifth tile down green.
In column #7 starting at the topmost tile, paint 4 tiles down blue, and then the next tile below those red.
In column #8 paint the fourth tile down red.
In column #9 starting at the topmost tile, paint 3 tiles down purple, and then the next tile below those green.
In column #10 paint the third tile down green.
In column #11 starting at the top 2 tiles down blue, and then the next tile below those red.
In column #12 paint the second tile down red.
In column #13 paint the topmost tile purple and second tile down green.
In column #14 paint the topmost tile red.
In column #15 paint the topmost tile green.
NONE
Starting in the leftmost column paint the top most tile green.
Paint the next three tiles below orange.
Paint the tile below blue.
In the next column paint the bottom most tile green.
Paint the next three tiles above orange.
Paint the tile above blue.
In the next column paint the top most tile blue.
Paint the next three tiles below purple.
Paint the tile below blue.
In the next column paint the bottom most tile blue.
Paint the next three tiles above purple.
Paint the tile above blue.
In the next column paint the top most tile green.
Paint the next three tiles below orange.
Paint the tile below blue.
In the next column paint the bottom most tile green.
Paint the next three tiles above purple.
Paint the tile above green.
In the next column paint the top most tile blue.
Paint the next three tiles below purple.
Paint the tile below blue.
In the next column paint the bottom most tile blue.
Paint the next three tiles above orange.
Paint the tile above green.
In the next column paint the top most tile green.
Paint the next three tiles below orange.
Paint the tile below blue.
In the next column paint the bottom most tile green.
Paint the next three tiles above orange.
Paint the tile above blue.
In the next column paint the top most tile green.
Paint the next three tiles below purple.
Paint the tile below green.
In the next column paint the bottom most tile green.
Paint the next three tiles above purple.
Paint the tile above green.
In the next column paint the top most tile blue.
Paint the next three tiles below orange.
Paint the tile below green.
In the next column paint the bottom most tile blue.
Paint the next three tiles above purple.
Paint the tile above blue.
In the next column pain the top most tile green.
Paint the next three tiles below orange.
Paint the tile below blue.
In the next column paint the bottom most tile blue.
Paint the next three tiles above purple.
Paint the tile above blue.
In the next column paint the top most tile green.
Paint the next three tiles below purple.
Paint the tile below green.
In the next column paint the bottom most tile green.
Paint the next three tiles above purple.
Paint the tile above green.
NONE
Use green to shade the top space of the 1st, 5th, 9th, 11th, 15th, and 17th columns, and the bottom space in the 2nd, 6th, 10th, 12th, and 18th columns.
Use blue to shade the top space of the 3rd, 7th, and 13th columns, and the bottom space of the 4th, 8th, 14th and 16th columns.
Shade the 5th spot in the 11th, 13th, and 17th columns, and the 6th spot in the 6th, 8th, 12th, and 18th columns green.
Shade the 5th spot in the 1st, 3rd, 5th, 7th, 9th, and 15th columns, and the 6th spot in the 2nd, 4th, 10th, 14th, and 16th columns blue.
3. Shade spaces between coordinating colors with three purple spots, and unmatching spots are filled with orange.
NONE
Make a line in the first column with one green tile on top, three orange tiles, and then a blue tile at the bottom.
Copy this shape in the fifth, ninth, and fifteenth columns.
Also, copy this shape to the bottom of the eighth column.

Make a similar shape in the top of the third column with blue, three purple, and the blue again, and copy this shape top of the seventh column and the bottom of the fourth, fourteenth, and sixteenth columns.
In the eleventh and seventeenth columns, make a similar shape with green tiles on top and bottom and three purple in between. Copy this shape to the bottom of the sixth, twelfth, and last column.
In the thirteenth column, make the same shape with the colors blue, three orange, and then green. Copy this to the bottom of the second and tenth columns.
NONE
Fill the top-left most hex green.
Fill a line of 5 hexes starting with the 3rd hex from the top in the left-most column going in a top-right direction to the top of the grid
Fill a parallel green line below the previous one, with one empty hex line between.

Mirror the green line starting in the left-most column filling the hex directly below the last green one and drawing in a bottom-right direction, but only fill 9 hexes, stopping in the same column as the line being mirrored.
Draw two more parallel lines in green in a bottom-right direction, one with 6 hexes and the last with 2 hexes, again with a empty hexes between each line.
Fill the top-right hex red, then fill a horizontal zig-zag (left-top,left-bottom,left-top,etc) filling 9 hexes until it touches a green hex.
Draw 4 more horizontal zig-zags, parallel to the first with a single empty hex between each
NONE
Use red to fill in the odd-numbered spots on the 10th-18th columns.
Use green to fill the 1st, 3rd, 5th, 6th, 8th, and 10th spots on the first column.
Create diagonal lines from the 3rd, 5th, 6th, 8th, and 10th spots to the edges.
NONE

On the top row, from right to left color in the first 9 top tiles, coming from right to left. Leave every other tile white, but continue to color every other row in the vertical column red. Color 5 sets red (5 lines that consist of the 9 most rightward tiles.
Color first tile on the top, left most column, green.  Leave the second and third tiles on the top most row blank and the tile below the green tile already colored, white.
color in the next diagonal row below the three white tiles, green, skip the next diagonal row, leaving it white, Color in the next vertical row, green.
Color the first row left most tile on the bottom, green, also the second row, lowest tile, color it green.

The next diagonal row up should be left white, then color the next row above that green, to make a diagonal line. Leaving the line above that white (similar as to the above pattern, mimic it). Finally color in the next line above the white one you left, green.
NONE
Starting with the 3rd column from the left, fill a line of purple hexes from the top hex to the 3rd hex from the top in the 8th hex from the left.
Mirror the purple line with another one starting from the 3rd hex down in the 10th hex from the left
Fill the two hexes in-between the purple lines with green as well as one additional green hex on top for a line of three green hexes.
In the same column as the green line, skip one hex and fill a purple line of 5 hexes, last one touching the bottom of the grid.

Mirror the purple diagonal lines with shorter green diagonal lines of 5 hexes, starting with the two hexes to the top-left and top-right of the top vertical purple line, going down to the left and right respectively.

Create 4 yellow circles, with the center hex empty but the surrounding 6 hexes filled, one in each space between the four lines. Circles should be as close as you can get to the convergence point of the lines, with circles touching the lines.
NONE
Create small yellow circles around the 4th spot in the 6th and 12th columns, the 8th spot in the 7th and 11th columns.
Use green on the 2nd-4th spots in the 9th column.
Use purple on the 6th-10th spots in the 9th column.
Make purple diagonal lines from the first spot in the 3rd and 15th columns to the 3rd green spot in the 9th column.
Make green diagonal lines from the 5th spots in the 8th and 10th columns to the 7th spots in the 4th and 14th columns.
NONE
The ninth column from the left, the fifth tile down will be the center, this tile is blank. Color the three tiles above it green.
Color the five tiles underneath the center purple.
The 3rd column from the left, color the topmost tile purple. The 8th column from the left, color the 3rd from the top purple.
Connect these two tiles with a straight line of purple tiles.
The 4th column from the right, the topmost tile is purple. The 9th column from the right, color the 3rd tile from the top purple.
Connect these two tiles with a straight purple line.
The 4th column from the left, color the 4th tile from the bottom green. The 8th column from the left, color the 6th tile from the bottom green.
Connect these 2 tiles with a straight green line.
The 5th column from the right, color the 4th tile from the bottom Green.
The 9th column from the right, color the 6th tile from the bottom green. Connect the last two tiles with a straight green line.
The sixth column from the left, the 4th tile down will be blank. There are 6 tiles surrounding this tile that will be colored yellow.
The seventh column from the left, the third tile from the bottom will be blank. Color the 6 tiles that are touching this tile yellow.
The eight column from the right, the 3rd from the bottom will be blank. Color the 6 tiles that are touching this tile yellow.
The 7th column from the right, the 4th tile down will be blank. Color the 6 tiles touching this tile yellow.
NONE
Starting in the top left corner, color that tile blue.
Skip one column to the right, then color that tile blue.
Color the tile underneath that tile blue.
Skip a column to the right and color that tile blue.  The two tiles under it will also be blue.

Repeat this process adding one to each column until you get to the end.  So, your fourth column will have four tiles colored blue, your fifth will have five tiles colored blue, and so on. Remember to skip a column in between.
NONE
using only blue for the whole drawing, paint the 1st tile in the 1st column
paint the top two tiles in the 3rd column
paint the top 3 tiles in the 5th column
paint the top 4 tiles in the 7th column
paint the top 5 tiles in the 9th column
paint the top 6 tiles in the 11th column
paint the top 7 tiles in the 13th column
paint the top 8 tiles in the 15th column
paint the top 9 columns in the 17th column
NONE
Paint the cell in the top left blue.
Moving towards the right on the topmost row, pain the next cell as well as the one beneath it blue.
Repeat step 2 until the topmost row is all painted blue, each time increasing the number of cells painted beneath the topmost cell by 1.
NONE
Color the bottom two spots in the second column green.
Go up and make the pattern one blue, two green continuing along the top spots of each column and going down the 15th column leaving the 1st spot in that column blank.
Leave the last space blank, and continue the pattern along the bottom edge leaving the last space of the even-numbered columns white.
Go up the 4th column and turn back to the right on the 3rd spot in the 5th column.
Go across to the 13th column, and go down to the 7th spot in that column before turning back left.
Continue across to the 6th column, and go up to the 5th spot to turn right, and end in the 5th spot on the 10th column.
NONE

Starting at the bottom of the second column from the left, begin to form a clockwise spiral by painting a continuous chain of tiles in the pattern two green, one blue, up the column and continuing to the right across the top of the grid until you come to the sixth column from the right.

Continue the color sequence, placing a green tile at the top of the fifth column from the right and the next green in the second tile from the top of the fourth column from the right, continuing the color pattern down that column until there is a blue tile in the second tile from the bottom of the column.
The next two green tiles go diagonally down and to the left of the blue tile from the end of the last step.

Continue the color pattern across the bottom of the grid so that the very bottom horizontal row remains blank, then up the fourth column from the left, and across the top, maintaining a blank line one tile thick from the outer line of the spiral, until you have placed a green tile in the third tile from the top in the seventh column from the right.
Place the next green tile in the fourth tile from the top of the sixth column from the right, with three more tiles painted in color sequence going down the column.

Put the next three blue tiles in these locations: in the fourth tile from the bottom of the seventh, tenth, and thirteenth columns from the right, filling in two green tiles between each of them to continue the unbroken spiral line.
Put two green tiles above the final blue tile from the last step.
Put the next blue tile in the fifth tile from the top of the seventh column from the left.
Complete the spiral with one more repetition of two greens and one blue, placing each one in the fifth tile from the top of the next three columns to the right.
NONE

This entire drawing uses a two green hexagon then 1 blue hexagon sequence. Begin at bottom of second column from left. Move straight up this column to the top and then color across the top row, stopping with a green hexagon at the 5th hexagon from the right side.

Next, for the second green hexagon in the color sequence, descend down to the second row (fourth hexagon from right side). From there, color down the fourth column until you get to the second to last hexagon (which is blue).

The next hexagon to the left should be green in the second row (5th from right side), but from there, descend to the first row, and alternate first row, second row on this line on the gride until you reach the fourth column from left (should be green hexagon).
At this green hexagon, go straight up until you reach the third hexagon from the top.
Then turn right and continue to the left on the third row 8 hexagons.  At the ninth hexagon (a green one) which is 6th hexagon from right, you should descend to the fourth row.
continue straight down this column three more hexagons (4th from bottom) and turn left. continue coloring the pattern for 5 more hexagons;
at the sixth hexagon, descend one row to the third row from the bottom; then immediately return to the fourth row from the bottom (a blue hexagon)
from this blue hexagon, go straight up two hexagons and complete the design by going right 4 more hexagons.
NONE
Color the 5th spot in the 10th column black.
make the spots above and below that purple.
extend diagonal lines up from the top purple dot to the top of the 3rd and 17th columns, and down from the bottom dot to the bottom of those columns.
Use red to fill in the 3 dots in the narrowest part of these two opposite arrows.
Use orange to fill in the 7 bordering spots above and below the red.
Use yellow to fill in the rest of the spots on top that are in the arrow, and the 11 spots that border the orange in the bottom arrow.
NONE
Paint the fifth hexagon in column ten black.
Paint the fourth hexagon in column ten purple and continue painting a diagonal row of purple hexagons to end with the first hexagon in column three.
Paint the fourth hexagon in column eleven purple and continue painting hexagons purple in a diagonal line ending with the first hexagon in column seventeen.

Repeat this pattern to create two more diagonal lines by painting the sixth hexagon in column ten purple and continuing down to the last hexagon in the third column and again starting with the seventh hexagon in the eleventh column and ending with the last hexagon in column seventeen.
Paint the third hexagons in columns nine, ten, and eleven red and copy the pattern under the purple diagonal hexagons below the black hexagon as well.
Paint the second hexagons in columns seven through thirteen orange and copy the pattern below again.
Paint the first hexagons in columns five through fifteen yellow and copy the pattern below.
NONE
Find the 5th tile from the top in the 10th column from the left. Color this tile BLACK.
Color the tile immediately above the black tile PURPLE.
For the 3rd column from the left and the 2nd column from the RIGHT, color the topmost tile PURPLE.
Fill in (PURPLE) the two diagonals between the three purple points to make a wide "V" shape.

There should be a triangular space of 3 rows of unfilled tiles enclosed by the "V". From bottom to top, fill in these rows with the following colors: RED, ORANGE, YELLOW. Do not color any squares outside the purple boundary.
Reflect the purple "V" and the colored tiles enclosed in it vertically, using the black tiles as the point of symmetry. Note that the bottom row of tiles should be unfilled.
NONE
Use green to fill all but the 1st and last spots in the 2nds and 16th columns, and create diagonal lines going from each end to the top and bottom.
Use yellow to fill the 5th-7th spots in the 3rd and 15th columns, and create diagonal lines going up and down to the 2nd and last spots in the 9th column.
Use red to fill the 3rd, 4th, 7th, and 8th spots in the 8th and 10th columns, the 6th spots in the 5th, 6th, 12th, and 13th columns, as well as the 5th spots in the 6th and 12th columns.
Use purple to fill the 6th spots in the 7th, 9th, and 11th columns, and the 5th and 6th spots in the 8th and 10th columns.
Fill the rest of the white spots inside the yellow shape with blue.
NONE
Leaving the top and bottom tiles blank, paint the second column from the left and the third column from the right green.
In the next column toward the center of the grid from each of the green columns paint the three tiles adjacent to the middle of the green columns yellow.

Counting from the left, in column nine, paint the bottom tile and the second tile from the top yellow, then paint yellow lines diagonally from those points to connect to the two yellow lines from the previous step, forming an approximate diamond shape.

Counting from the left, in columns eight and ten, paint the fifth and sixth tiles purple (counting from either top or bottom), then paint the adjacent tile in the center between them and the ones in the center just outside of them purple also.
With red, paint the two tiles directly above and below the purple tiles in columns eight and ten from the previous step.

Still using red, in the next column outward toward the right and left, paint the two tiles outside and adjacent to the purple shape, then paint one more red tile in each of the next outermost columns, centered between the two red tiles on each side.
Using blue, fill in the remaining blank tiles inside the yellow diamond.
From the tops and bottoms of the green columns, moving toward the center of the grid, extend the green diagonally to to the upper and lower edges of the grid, parallel to the yellow lines.
NONE
Fill the second column from the left with green, except for the top-most and bottom-most hex which stays white.
From the top-most green hex extend a line of 3 hexes in a top-right direction.
From the bottom-most green hex extend a line of 2 hexes in a bottom-right direction.
In the 9th column from the left, fill the 2nd hex from the top and the bottom most hex with yellow.
From the top yellow hex, extend a line of 6 more hexes in a down/left direction. From the bottom yellow hex, extend a line of 6 more hexes in a top/left direction.
Fill the hex between the two yellow ones in the 3rd column from the left will yellow.
Fill the two hexes between yellow in the 4th column from the left with blue.
In the 9th column from the left, fill the hexes between the two yellow ones with blue, but make the center hex (with 3 blue above and below) purple.
Fill the two purple hexes touching the middle purple hex on the left purple, do the same with the two touching hexes on the right.
In the 7th column from the left, fill the space between the yellow with 2 sets of 2 blue hexes with the center hex purple.
In the 6th column from the left, fill the two center hexes between the yellow with red, with blue hexes above and below touching the yellow hexes.
Use red to fill a single hex to form a triangle shape, then fill blue above and below that hex.
In the 8th column from the left, fill the white spaces between the yellow lines with red.
Mirror the rest of the entire pattern around the 9th column.
NONE
Counting from the top left, paint the third tile in the sixth column black.

Counting from the top left, paint these tiles black: the fifth and seventh tiles of column nine, the fourth and ninth tiles of column eleven, the sixth tile of column twelve, the ninth tile of column thirteen, the fourth tile of column fourteen, and the sixth and eighth tiles of column fifteen.
Paint all tiles adjacent to the black tiles from the previous step (step 2) red.
Counting from the left, using red, paint the adjacent tile to the topmost red tile in columns nine, ten, twelve, and thirteen, and the adjacent tile to the bottom red tile in columns eight and nine.
Counting from the lower left, using red, paint the third, fourth and fifth tiles in the seventh column.
Paint a red ring around and adjacent to the black tile in the sixth column from the left, but leaving the lower right tile blank.
Counting from the top left, paint a red tile in the fifth tile of the sixth column and in the second tile of the eighth column.
Counting from top left, paint a black tile in the fourth tile of column three, the third tile of column four, and the top two tiles of column five.

NONE
    Fill a circle of 6 red hexes, enclosing a single hex filled with black. The top hex of the circle is the 5th hex from the top in the 4th column from the right.
    Draw additional red circles enclosing a black hex, use the bottom hex of the first circle as the top hex of the new circle.
    Draw additional red circles enclosing a black hex, with some hexes overlapping previously filled circles. The top hexes of the circles are the 3rd hex from the bottom in the 6th and 8th columns from the right; the 5th hex from the top in the 7th column from the right; the 4th hex from the top and 6th hex from the top in the 9th column from the left; and in the 8th column from the right, the 3rd hex from the top; and in the 5th column from the right the 3rd hex from the top
    In the 6th column from the left use the 2nd hex from the top as the top hex in a red circles enclosing a black hex, but leave the hex in the bottom-right white.
    In the 5th column from the left fill the top two hexes black.
    In the 4th column from the left color the 3rd hex from the top black as well as one hex down and to the left.
    In the 7th column from the left, fill the 6th hex from the top and the two hexes below it with red. From the first hex also fill the hex to the top-left red, from the bottom hex fill two hexes extending in the bottom-right direction with red.
    In the 7th column from the right, fill the 2nd hex from the top red, as well as the hex down and to the right of it.
    In the 9th column from the left, fill the 3rd hex from the top red, as well as a single hexes on both sides to the top-left and top-right.
NONE

On ninth row from left go to the fifth tile from the top, color it black, also color in black the second tile below this one.
On 11th row from left color in the fourth tile from top black, also color in black the fifth tile below that one.
On the 12th row from left, 6th tile from the top, color in that tile black.
On the 13th row from left, color in the second tile up from the bottom of that column, black.
On 5th row from the rightmost row, (going leftward) color black the fourth tile from the top.
On 4th column from the rightmost column (going leftward), color black the 6th tile from the top and the 8th from the top.
Now color red all tiles touching ANY black tile placed so far.
Starting with the 9th column from the left, second tile upward from the bottom of that column, color red, that tile and the next 4 tiles that border the left and bottom most part of the bug so far, adding another layer (row) of red in this fashion. Also add above the colored top, on the 12th and 13th columns from left an additional tile (1 on each of the two rows here) to add to the topmost red aspect of the Lady Bug Beetle here.
Color the center of the Ladybug's head black, coloring the third tile down on 6th column from left to make this so.
Color all tiles red around this black head just placed except the tile that would be to the right lower part, or the part of the head that would most directly connect it to the insect's body.

Using a red tile, now, leaving three white tiles (One is the center one that was left blank in last step and two lower down and to the part of the "neck" toward the body of the insect. leave them blank. The Trio of blank tiles, except for the head will be encased in red tiles, surrounded almost completely. On 10th row from left color in the second tile from top red
Add Antennae's with black tiles, a pair on each side of the head, as if the insect were facing diagonally.
NONE
Make diagonal yellow lines going from the first and last spots of the first and last columns to the center.
Use orange to make diagonal lines going from the 2nd spot in the 1st column, and the next to last spot in the last column to the center, but don't cover the yellow.
Make two more diagonal lines with orange from the last spot in the 2nd column and the 1st spot in the next to last column to the center without covering any yellow.
NONE
Using yellow, draw a diagonal line connecting the top of the first column on the right to the bottom of the first column on the left.

Still using yellow, draw lines from the top of the leftmost column and the bottom of the rightmost column, to connect the corners to the original yellow line, forming as close to an X as the grid allows.
With orange, paint the line or tiles adjacent counterclockwise to each of the arms of the X.
NONE
Paint a diagonal line of yellow hexagons starting with the last hexagon in the first column and ending with the first hexagon in the last column.
Paint another diagonal line of yellow hexagons starting with the first hexagon in the first column and ending with the fifth hexagon in the ninth column.
Paint another diagonal line of yellow hexagons starting with the sixth hexagon in the tenth column and ending with the last hexagon in the column furthest to the right.
Paint a row of orange hexagons from hexagon two in the first column and ending with the fifth hexagon in the eighth column.
Paint a row of orange hexagons starting with hexagon four in column ten and ending with the first hexagon in the column furthest to the right.
Paint an orange line of hexagons starting with hexagon six in column eleven and ending with the second to last hexagon in the last column to the right.
Paint a row of orange hexagons starting with the seventh hexagon in the ninth column and ending with the last hexagon in the second column.
NONE
Fill the 10th column alternating blue then orange all the way down.
Create a diagonal line going from the 1st spot in the 1st column to the next to last spot in the last column alternating purple then red.
Create a diagonal line going up from the last spot in the 1st column to the 1st spot in the last column alternating yellow then green. Paint the tile in the center black.
Use purple to make a tiny triangle filling in the 2nd spot in the 7th column, and the 1st two spots in the 8th column.
Mirror that shape on the other side of the blue and orange line, but in green.
Use red to make a larger triangle by filling in the 4th-7th spots in the 3rd column, 4th and 6th spots in the 4th column, 5th and 6th in the 5th column, and 5th in the 6th column.
Mirror that shape in orange on the right side.
Use blue to make a medium triangle by filling the last 3 spots in the 8th column, the last 2 in the 7th column, and the next to last spot in the 6th column.
Mirror that shape on the other side of the blue and orange line in yellow.
NONE
Going diagonally from top right to bottom left alternate green and yellow tiles, starting with green.

Going diagonally down from top left to the second tile from the bottom on the right, alternate purple and red, starting with purple, skipping over the tile that is already painted, but counting it as red for the purpose of the alternating pattern.

Counting from the left, paint the ninth column in alternating blue and orange, starting with blue and converting the tile that was already painted to black, but treating it as blue for the purpose of counting the alternating pattern.

In the second column from the right, paint tiles four through seven from the top in orange, then use those four tiles as the base of an equilateral orange triangle, with its apex pointing toward the black tile, leaving a blank tile in the center of the triangle.
Starting in the third column from the left, using red, create a triangle like the orange one from the previous step, also pointing toward the black tile.
Starting with the bottom three tiles of the column two columns to the right of the blue and orange center column, paint a yellow equilateral triangle, three tiles to each side.
Starting with the three bottom tiles of the column that is two columns to the left of the center column, paint a blue equilateral triangle, three tiles to each side.
Starting in the same column as the previous step, two to the left of the center column, paint the top two tiles purple, then paint the adjacent tile between them to the left purple also.
Using green, paint the mirror image of the shape from the previous step, beginning in the column that is two columns to the right of the center column.
NONE
Staring in the top left corner, fill a line in a bottom-right direction with alternating purple and red hexes (purple first, last hex will be red)

Starting in the bottom-left corner, fill a line in a top-right direction with alternating yellow and green hexes (yellow first, green in top-right) Where this line intersects with the previous one, fill that hex black.
Fill the 10th column from the left with alternating blue and orange hexes, first hex blue, last hex orange, leaving the hex in the middle black (with orange above and below)

In the white space on the left of the grid, fill a red triangle with 4 hexes on a side and the center hex staying white. Keep 1 white hex between the sides of the triangle and the large diagonal lines, the base of the triangle is 4 hexes in the 3rd column from the left.
Mirror the red triangle onto the right side of the grid, but use orange instead.

In the bottom-right white space, fill a yellow triangle three hexes on a side, the base filling the 3 hexes and the bottom of the 7th column from the right, the point of the triangle is the 2nd hex from the bottom in the 5th column from the right.
Mirror the yellow triangle into the white space on the bottom-left of the grid, but make this triangle blue.

In the white space in the top-left, fill a purple triangle with 1 hex on a side, 1 white hex between it and the lines. The 2-hex base of the triangle is the same column as the base of the blue triangle below.
Mirror the purple triangle into the white space in the top-right, but use green.
NONE
Fill the 5th and 15th columns with yellow.
Make the 1st and last spots in the 7th, 9th, 11th, and 13th columns.
Use orange to fill the 1st, 2nd, 4th-7th, 9th, and 10th spots in the 10th column.
Fill the 3rd spot in the 10th column with red and create diagonal lines going down from there to the yellow lines, and back in to the 8th spot on the 10th column.
Use green to fill the 6th spots in the 7th, 9th, 11th, and 13th columns.
Fill the rest of the inside of the red shape with blue.
Fill the white spots inside the yellow lines with purple.
NONE
Counting from the right, paint the ninth column orange, leaving the third tile from the top and bottom blank.
Paint the tile adjacent to the right and left of the center of the orange column green (the tile touching between tiles five and six of the orange column.
Paint the remaining adjacent blank tiles surrounding the outside of the green tiles blue.
Paint the tile adjacent to the outer right and left edges of the blue arcs of tiles green.
Using red, paint a diamond-like border around the central cluster of painted tiles.
With yellow, paint the columns outside and adjacent to the outer edge of the red diamond.

Working across the top, paint the top tile yellow for each of the columns that has the higher top, then paint the bottom tile of each of those columns yellow, as well, so that every other column has a yellow top and bottom tile.
Using purple, fill in all remaining blank tiles within the yellow periphery (leaving the very bottom tiles blank that would extend outside the yellow border).
NONE
Paint all tiles in column five and column fifteen yellow.
Starting at the first yellow tile in column five, paint the next four tiles to the right of it, in the same row, yellow.
Starting at the last yellow tile in column five, paint the next four tiles to the right of it, in the same row, yellow.
In column ten, paint tiles 1, 2, 4-7, 9, and 10 orange.
In column ten, starting at tile 3, paint it red, plus the next four tiles that come off of it diagonally both to the lower left and lower right (It will kind of have an upside down "V" shape).

In column ten, starting at tile 8, paint it red, plus the next four tiles that come off of it diagonally both to the upper left and upper right (It will kind of have a "V" shape). So, the two red "V's" you just made will be connected to each other forming a diamond shape.
Fill in all remaining tiles inside of the yellow square but OUTSIDE OF THE "DIAMOND" purple.
In the very center of the red "diamond", paint the four tiles going horizontally (in row six) green.
Paint all remaining tiles inside of the "diamond" blue.
NONE
Create a jack-o-lantern by using orange to fill spots 3-7 in columns 5-13, spots 2 in columns 6, 8, 10, and 12, and spots 8 in columns 7-10.
Add the stem by making a diagonal line that does up to the right from spot 2 column 9.
Use black to make eyes by filling in the 4th spots in the 8th and 10th columns.
Use yellow for the mouth, filling in the 6th spots on the 7-11th columns.
NONE
In the 9th column from the left, color the 6th cell from the top yellow
On either side of this cell, color the next two yellow, going diagonally down then back up on both sides so there is a 5-cell long zig-zag in yellow centered on the cell from the first step
Directly above this duplicate this zig-zag line in orange
Directly above the line from step 3, color the two cells in the valleys of the zig-zag line black, so they are on either side of center of the figure
Surround the entire figure drawn so far with two rows of orange cells. This involves drawing two ovals of orange hexes around the existing figure
At the top of the figure, in the 9th column, color the center cell green and then the next two cells going diagonally up to the right green as well.
Color another cell orange at the top of the figure, in the 5th, 6th, 12th and 13th columns.
NONE
Counting from the left, paint the fourth tile from the top black in columns eight and ten.

Skipping one tile below each of the black tiles, paint the next tile down yellow, then in the pairs of adjacent tiles between and to the outside of those two yellow tiles, paint the upper tile of those pairs yellow, forming a jagged line of five yellow tiles.

Counting from upper left and skipping over any tiles already painted, using orange, paint column five, tiles three through seven, column six, tiles two through seven, column seven, tiles three through eight, column eight, tiles two through eight, and column nine (the center of the design), tiles three through eight, then continue working to the right to complete a mirror image of the left, so that the design is symmetrical.
Starting in the second tile from the center top (column nine from the left) paint three green tiles going upward diagonally.
NONE
In the 7th and 15th columns, leave two white tiles, then colour in the rest following this pattern: two blue, one white, and repeat twice.
In the 1st, 4th, 9th, 12th, and 17th columns, leave one white, then colour in the rest following this pattern: two white, one blue, and repeat twice.

In the 5th and 13th columns leave one white, then colour in following this pattern: two white, one blue, repeat. In the 2nd, 10th and 19th columns colour in following the same pattern without leaving one white at the top.
NONE
Starting at the bottom left, paint the first, fourth, and seventh tiles blue, in columns 1, 4, 9, 12, and 17
Paint the next adjacent tile to the upper right of each of these tiles blue.
In the fourth column from the right, starting at the bottom, paint the first and second, fourth and fifth, and seventh and eighth tiles blue.
Repeat the pattern from this column in the seventh column from the left.
